Plot: Max Neptune and the Atomic Space Patrol face their biggest threat ever. Dr. Agotch and his giant, mechanical, Menacing Squid!
Title: Max Neptune and the Menacing Squid
Writer: Colin Fleming (story), John Garside (story), Jerry Renek (story)
Actors: Curt Clendenin, Michael Ornelas, Keaton Shyler, David Uchansky
